meanings.definition: A large venomous snake found in Central and South America.
meanings.sent1: The bushmaster slithered silently through the dense jungle.
meanings.sent2: Watch out for the bushmaster when hiking in the rainforest.
meanings.sent3: The bushmaster decided to take a nap in the sun, scaring off all the other animals.
meanings.sent4: Her gaze was as deadly as a bushmaster's bite.
meanings.sent5: The bushmaster's scales shimmered in the moonlight, a sight to behold.

meanings.definition: A type of military vehicle used for transporting troops and supplies in rough terrain.
meanings.sent1: The bushmaster rumbled through the muddy battlefield, carrying soldiers to safety.
meanings.sent2: The army relied on the bushmaster to navigate through the rugged mountains.
meanings.sent3: The bushmaster vehicle got stuck in the mud, much to the amusement of the soldiers.
meanings.sent4: The bushmaster moved like a giant metal beast across the rocky landscape.
meanings.sent5: The soldiers felt invincible inside the bushmaster, protected from enemy fire.

meanings.definition: A person who is skilled in surviving and navigating in the wilderness.
meanings.sent1: As a bushmaster, he could find food and shelter in the harshest of environments.
meanings.sent2: The group trusted the bushmaster to lead them safely through the dense forest.
meanings.sent3: The bushmaster expertly started a fire using only two sticks and a leaf.
meanings.sent4: She was a true bushmaster, always one step ahead in the wilderness.
meanings.sent5: His reputation as a bushmaster spread far and wide, admired by all who knew him.
